summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4516 for the improvement of West Galer Street and West Galer Street as extended, from 30th Avenue West to 32nd Avenue West; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52940, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
